description:
Active around 290 A.D., a twelve-year-old during the fierce government of Maximos in Nicaea, Saint Neophytos the Holy Martyr worked many wonders and underwent a brutal martyrdom, putting his torturers to shame. This is his story.

This Synaxarion includes:
1 Story Level: Nicaea - The story is uncovered as you play through the experience.
1 Mini Dungeon
1 Story of the life of a Saint (Neophytos the Holy Martyr)

After an introduction to the saint and the time period surrounding him, play as a witness to his life in Nicaea, a city of present-day Turkey. Complete Quests, collect items, and follow the Saint's trail to hear his story.

These stories are short and are not intended to take up much time to play through. Expect to play for 40-60 minutes to complete this experience.

The Synaxarion is a collection of Saintsâ€™ lives, which are celebrated each day of the year. They are a light that leads us to Christ in every generation, a living Gospel. The ministry and very life of Christ is worked out in the lives of the Saints, His faithful servants. They are the glory of the Church, the God-bearers on earth and in heaven. Most of the saints were unknown to the world, but the Grace of God made them known to the whole universe and to all the ages. Amen.
name: Synaxarion Christian Stories: Holy Martyr Neophytos
